questions.question: What is the time complexity of binary search?
What is a linked list?
options: A data structure consisting of nodes that point to the next node
A collection of elements stored in contiguous memory locations
A data structure that allows random access
questions.answer: A data structure consisting of nodes that point to the next node

questions.question: What is the difference between a stack and a queue?
options: Stack follows LIFO; Queue follows FIFO
Stack follows FIFO; Queue follows LIFO
Stack allows random access; Queue does not
questions.answer: Stack follows LIFO; Queue follows FIFO

questions.question: What is a hash table?
options: A data structure that maps keys to values for efficient lookup
A data structure that allows sorting
questions.answer: A data structure that maps keys to values for efficient lookup

questions.question: What is the purpose of a binary tree?
options: To store data in a sorted manner
